marklogic.body: Obama lied to us that we have only 2% of the world oil reserves.Â We have 20 billion barrels of proven oil reservesÂ 100billion barrels that we could use in the future.Â America has enough domestic oil, gas and coal reserves to last one hundred years with not one drop coming from Arabia.Â Obama vetoed the Candian Gas Pipeline which was a shame because it would have created 20,000 high paying contruction jobs and 100,000 additional jobs.Â Obama and Michelle do not care about our unemployed construction workers feeding their kids dogfood. They prefer expensive Hawiian vacations, eating fine steaks (Gaining waight were it shows), and shooting lots of golf.Â Michelle's reckless spending of taxpayer money would make the French Bourbon Kings Blush with envy.
